name: InteractiveGridPattern
description: A interactive background grid pattern made with SVGs, fully customizable using Tailwind CSS.

metadata.title: Interactive Grid Pattern
metadata.description: A interactive background grid pattern made with SVGs, fully customizable using Tailwind CSS.
metadata.author: h3rmel

props.name: width
props.default: Width of each square in the grid

props.name: height
props.default: Height of each square in the grid

props.name: squares
props.default: Number of squares in the grid. First number is horizontal squares, second is vertical squares

props.name: className
props.default: Class name applied to the grid container

props.name: squaresClassName
props.default: Class name applied to individual squares in the grid
